Step1.Title: Grow Your Cult of Superfans
Step1.Description: We're excited to welcome you to our community of musicians and fans

Step2.Title: Engage and Monetise!
Step2.Description: Our tools enable you to identify and engage your loyal fans along your journey to stardom

Step3.Title: Grow and Reward the People that Love You!
Step3.Description: Built for musicians. By musicians. It's the fans that matter most.

ListMood.Title: Mood
ListMood.EmptyState: Sorry, we don't have any music available for this mood at the moment. Check back soon as we're always adding new music!

ListGenre.Title: Genre
ListGenre.EmptyState: Sorry, we don't have any music available for this genre at the moment. Check back soon as we're always adding new music!

Trending.EmptyState: We're sorry! There's no trending feed available right now. Check back soon, as we're always working to bring you the best music social media experience.

Similar.EmptyState: We're sorry, but there are currently no feeds available from similar artists. Check back soon for new updates!

MyArtist.EmptyState: Looks like there are no posts from the musicians you follow. Follow more musicians to see their posts in your feed.

ComingSoon.Title: Coming Soon
ComingSoon.EmptyState: Unfortunately, there are no new albums coming soon from any musicians. We'll let you know as soon as something new is on the horizon.

Song.EmptyState: Oops! We couldn't find any {{title}} for you. Check back soon as we're always adding new music!

Musician.EmptyState: We couldn't find any {{title}} for you. Check back soon as we're always adding new musician!

Account.Title: Account
Account.Confirm: Are you sure you want to update your account?

DeleteAccount.Title: Delete Account
DeleteAccount.Subtitle: Are you sure you want to delete your account?

About.FirstParagraph: This means that all of your assets and data associated with your account will be permanently deleted.
About.SecondParagraph: Unfortunately, this action is irreversible and cannot be reversed in the future. We understand that this decision may not be easy for you to make.
About.ThirdParagraph: Therefore, we allow you to have 30 days to log in and cancel your account deletion request. Once this period has passed, your account will be permanently deleted.
About.FourthParagraph: If you wish to delete your account, please select a reason from the dropdown menu below :

Reason.First: I don’t feel safe on Beamco
Reason.Fourth: I spend too much time using Beamco
Reason.Five: I don’t understand how to use Beamco

Limit.Title: Limit Reached
Limit.Subtitle1: You have reached the limit of uploading 10 photos, please delete some of your photos to upload new ones.
Limit.Subtitle2: Some of your photos cannot be uploaded because you have reached your limit. You can only upload up to 10 photos in your profile. Delete some photos to upload the new ones.
Limit.SubtitleSR1: You have reached the limit of uploading 4 photos, please delete some of your photos to upload new ones.
Limit.SubtitleSR2: Some of your photos cannot be uploaded because you have reached your limit. You can only upload up to 4 photos. Delete some photos to upload the new ones.

RecoverAccount.Title: Account Deletion
RecoverAccount.FirstParagraph: You have signed in to your account which is currently undergoing the deletion process.
RecoverAccount.SecondParagraph: Please keep in mind that you can still recover your account within the next 30 days.
RecoverAccount.ThirdParagraph: However, once you delete your account, all of your data, including your saved preferences and settings, will be permanently erased.

Modal.Title: Recover Account
Modal.Subtitle: Are you sure you recover your account?
